title: Westwood 2BR 2BA Penthouse Loft w/ High Ceilings!
neighborhood: Westwood 90024/UCLA, Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hills
posting_body: ['Top Floor 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Penthouse Loft Apartment in Westwood Village Building, 1 Block from UCLA.', 'Viewing by appointment only.', 'Please do not visit property without our leasing agent.', 'This 2 bedroom penthouse loft apartment features spacious living areas, with extra high ceilings, laminate flooring, great views, a balcony, a gas fireplace, air conditioning, and more!', 'Enjoy quality living at an affordable price at The Hilgard!', 'Kitchen is equipped with a refrigerator, a dishwasher, a microwave, and a gas stove.', 'With our dedicated maintenance department, you’ll have more opportunities to enjoy life.', 'Take advantage of several public parks nearby or enjoy our picnic area with barbecues.', 'Call us today at', 'show contact info', 'for a personal tour!', 'Our wonderful staff is looking forward to serving you with excellence.', 'Visit our website at <URL>.', '972 Hilgard Avenue', 'Westwood, Los Angeles, California, 90024', 'Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hills', 'This 2 bedroom apartment offers the following amenities:', 'Cable Ready', 'Laminate Flooring', 'Central Air/Heating', 'Cozy Gas Fireplace', 'Refrigerator', 'Disability Access', 'Microwave', 'Mirrored Closet Doors', 'Tile Entryway, Kitchen And Bathroom Floors', 'Private Balcony', 'Dishwasher', 'Community Amenities:', 'Assigned Parking', 'Extra Storage', 'Cable Available', 'Elevator', 'Controlled Access', 'Roof Terrace', 'BBQ/Grill Area', 'Garage', 'Disclaimer: Pictures are a representation but may not be of the exact apartment.', 'Advertised unit availability, rental rates, and terms are updated every 24 hours and conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Please call for latest availability details.']
